name: Space War (itch) (SultanHa)
description:
Hello! This is my Space War Project for Coursera.

Modifications: 

  • Changed Main Menu Background
  • Added 2 more levels & added them to the select menu 
  • Added Enemy spawner script in levels 3 and 4
  • Added more art like new Planets etc
  • Changed Game Music 
  • Added All types of enemies like Chaser
  • Made when you finish the game it moves you to the MainMenu instead of level1 and changed texts to (You won)

Credits: Sultan Ha

*Note: There's an issue with screenshots not showing up, so I uploaded them here.
